attributes.action: Re-instate Paul Murphy MP as a Senior Cabinet Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Paul Murphy MP was an extremely successful and well respected Welsh Secretary of State and Secretary of State for Northern Ireland. I urge the Labour Government to Re-instate Mr Paul Murphy MP to a Senior Position in the Labour Cabinet. Mr Paul Murphy MP is a highly experienced Parliamentarian with a wealth of experience as a Senior Cabinet Minister.
